eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.ingested

Class IndexSimSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.ingested.IndexSimSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class IndexSimSearch
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Instantiates a similarity search query of varying type (categorical, string, numerical, spatial, temporal). Applies only against an ingested data source supported by a suitable in-memory index.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexSimSearch

        public IndexSimSearch(int operation,
                      String name,
                      Index<Object,Object> idx,
                      Map<?,?> map,
                      TokenSetCollection queryCollection,
                      int topk,
                      int collectionSize,
                      ISimilarity simMeasure,
                      RankedList resultsQueue,
                      String hashKey,
                      Logger log)
        Constructor for CATEGORICAL/TEXTUAL similarity search against against an already constructed index over sets of tokens.
        Parameters:
        operation - The type of the similarity search query (0: CATEGORICAL, 8: TEXTUAL).
        name - A user-specified name given to the running instance of similarity search.
        idx - Handle to the inverted index already built over the input data tokens.
        map - The original collection of tokens (i.e., keywords) specified in the query.
        queryCollection - The query collection of tokens to search for similarity.
        topk - The number of the final top-k results.
        collectionSize - The count of results to fetch.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used in the search.
        resultsQueue - Queue to collect query results.
        hashKey - The unique hash key assigned to this search query.
        log - Handle to the log file for keeping messages and statistics.

      • IndexSimSearch

        public IndexSimSearch(int operation,
                      String name,
                      Index<Object,Object> idx,
                      double searchingKey,
                      int topk,
                      int collectionSize,
                      ISimilarity simMeasure,
                      RankedList resultsQueue,
                      String hashKey,
                      Logger log)
        Constructor for NUMERICAL/TEMPORAL similarity search queries against an already constructed index over numerical (or temporal epoch) values.
        Parameters:
        operation - The type of the similarity search query (2: NUMERICAL, 7: TEMPORAL).
        name - A user-specified name given to the running instance of similarity search.
        idx - The underlying index.
        searchingKey - The key (numerical/epoch) value to search against the index.
        collectionSize - The count of results to fetch.
        topk - The number of the final top-k results.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used in the search.
        resultsQueue - Queue to collect query results.
        hashKey - The unique hash key assigned to this search query.
        log - Handle to the log file for keeping messages and statistics.

      • IndexSimSearch

        public IndexSimSearch(int operation,
                      String name,
                      Index<Object,Object> idx,
                      Location queryLocation,
                      int topk,
                      int collectionSize,
                      ISimilarity<?> simMeasure,
                      RankedList resultsQueue,
                      String hashKey,
                      Logger log)
        Constructor for SPATIAL similarity search queries against an already constructed index over POINT locations.
        Parameters:
        operation - The type of the similarity search query (1: SPATIAL).
        name - A user-specified name given to the running instance of similarity search.
        idx - The underlying index.
        queryLocation - The query location to be used for searching against the index.
        topk - The number of the final top-k results.
        collectionSize - The count of results to fetch.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used in the search.
        resultsQueue - Queue to collect query results.
        hashKey - The unique hash key assigned to this search query.
        log - Handle to the log file for keeping messages and statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • applyNumericalSimSearch

        public boolean applyNumericalSimSearch(Index<Object,Object> idx,
                                       Double searchingKey)
        Instantiates a numerical similarity search query. CAUTION! Also used in temporal similarity search since date/time values have been stored as numerical epoch values in the index.
        Parameters:
        idx - The B+-tree index used in the search. It contains (numerical) keys and (string) values for the object identifiers.
        searchingKey - The search key against the index (i.e., the numerical value specified by the query).
        Returns:
        A boolean value: True, if the query is still running; otherwise, False.

      • applySpatialSimSearch

        public boolean applySpatialSimSearch(Index<Object,Object> idx,
                                     Location searchLoc)
        Instantiates a spatial similarity search query.
        Parameters:
        idx - The R-tree index used in the search. It contains (MBR) keys and (id, location) values for the objects.
        searchLoc - The query location to search for k-NN similarities against the index.
        Returns:
        A boolean value: True, if the query is still running; otherwise, False.

      • applyCategoricalSimSearch

        public boolean applyCategoricalSimSearch(Index<Object,Object> idx,
                                         TokenSetCollection queryCollection)
        Instantiates a categorical similarity search query against an inverted index of sets of tokens.
        Parameters:
        idx - The inverted index previously built over the target data (i.e., sets of tokens identified on a user-specified attribute).
        queryCollection - The collection of query tokens to search in the dataset.
        Returns:
        A boolean value: True, if the query is still running; otherwise, False.

      • applyTextualSimSearch

        public boolean applyTextualSimSearch(Index<Object,Object> idx,
                                     TokenSetCollection queryCollection)

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the specified similarity search query against the index and returns results one-by-one.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
